recent.title: WNFA (an interactive art project)
recent.desc: WNFA (Words Never Fall Apart) is an interactive art project that uses grid method and machine learning to generate art from handwritten poems.

recent.title: WNFA Poster Generator (online version of the WNFA project)
recent.desc: A publicly-available online version of the original WNFA project with its backend supported by Azure serverless computing products. The frontend is redesigned to adapt the new requimemnts

recent.title: WNFA Virtual Gallery (a 3D website)
recent.desc: A 3D Virtual Gallery display the poster results generated by WNFA at Zhejiang Exhibition Hall from 06.01.2022 to 06.12.2022. It is written in pure JavaScript. 3D is achieved by CSS 3D transform.

recent.title: Aghnu's ASCII Art Generator
recent.desc: An ASCII Art Toolkit Website written in JavaScript, using opencv.js. Code is running on client side. It supports gif and static images convertion. The output is displayed as HTML elements and animated by JavaScript.

recent.title: Aghnu's Console
recent.desc: A personal project that serves as my personal website. It is meant to explore new website design that differs from common patterns

recent.title: GFE.js (an open source js module)
recent.desc: GFE is a simplification of the project libgif-js. It provides a function to extract the frames of a gif.

recent.title: Stranding Air (the frontend website of a creator community)
recent.desc: A website for a group of passionate people who are interested in exploring the boundary of visual design, art, media, and technology.

recent.title: Yu Liu's Homepage
recent.desc: Yu Liu's personal website portfolio developed by me. Collabrated with the designer at Wudiao on UI/UX design. Used Azure CDN and DNS to ensure content is accessible in China

past.title: Interactive Moodle Plugin
past.desc: This plugin is a Moodle Activity Module that is developed for Delphi technology as part of their future online learning platform for aviators. (UAlberta CMPUT401 class project)

past.title: A python implementation of Hollow Heap
past.desc: hollow_heap.py is a python implementation of Hollow Heap base on Thomas Dueholm Hansen, Haim Kaplan, Robert E. Tarjan, Uri Zwick 's paper https://arxiv.org/abs/1510.06535. (UAlberta CMPUT403 class project)

past.title: MoodSwing
past.desc: MoodSwing is a Java-based android app designed to record and archive userâ€™s mood in relation to geo location and time. Users can follow each other on MoodSwing and view their friend's mood records. (UAlberta CMPUT301 class project)

past.title: Yonder
past.desc: Yonder is a distributed social network using RESTful API. (UAlberta CMPUT404 class project)
